version_description:
● 360° video support.
● file download bug fix.
● minor bug fix

● bug fix - app crashes on iOS 8.x
● minor bug fix

● fix performance issue on iOS 8.x
● max resolution option for 360° video
● frame per second (fps) option for 360° video
● screen gap option for VR
● minor bug fix

● support photo and slideshow
● enhance quality of 360° video display
- add Anti-Aliasing (segment count of sphere) option for 360° video
● minor bug fix

● support 180° video
● embed photo library into VRPlayer and support keyboard control
● enhance embedded web browser.
● add buttons to control playback rate.
● minor bug fix

● support panorama photo
- enjoy your own panorama photos in VR
● misoperation of subtitle button bug fix
● minor bug fix

● supported by Google VR SDK
● minor bug fix

● partial screen display bug fix on iPhone Plus
● video library listing bug fix on iOS 8.x
● minor bug fix

● support multilingual filesystem for VRPlayer Helper.
● minor bug fix

● support "open In" feature for smi/srt files.
● minor bug fix

● support Picture In Picture mode for iPad.
● add more options for screen position.
● bug fix for dropbox.
● minor bug fix
● minor bug fix
● Bug fixes
● Bug fixes
● Bug fixes
● FTP bug fixes on iOS 10.3.x
● critical initialize bug fixes on iOS 10.3.2
● bug fixes for Dropbox & GoogleDrive

● bug fixes for recognizing hevc & h265 codec
● now you can control function buttons on video screen
with number key when using keyboard control
- 1 : Toggle 360°/180° Video
- 2 : Toggle VR Mode
- 3 : Change 2D/3D Mode
- 4 : Zoom In/Out
- 5 : Back To Center / Motion Tracking
- 6 : Motion Tracking Constraint
- 7 : Loop
- 8 : Audio/Subtitle

● support OpenGL
● bug fixes for iOS 11
● bug fixes for 180° video

● iPhone X compatibility
● Bug fixes

● iPhone X layout bug fixes
● Minor bug fixes

● Add import/export feature for 'Files' app.
● Minor bug fixes
● Folder lock feature bug fixes for face ID devices.

● support iOS 13 dark mode feature.
● You can control VRPlayer with Game Controller
※ supported controller
- XBox controller
- Playstation Dualshock controller
- Other MFi certified game controller
※ while navigating
- up / down : move cursor by item
- up / down + RB : move cursor by page
- right / A : select item
- left / B : back to previous
※ while playing
- up / down : move cursor by button
- A : select button & do action
- B : stop & back to list
- X : play & pause
- right : move forward 5 seconds
- left : move backward 5 seconds
- right + RB : move forward 1 minute
- left + RB : move backward 1 minute
- up + RB : play previous video
- down + RB : play next video
● minor bug fixes.
